title: A Dragon's Sacred Mate
description:
An alternative cover edition for this ASIN can be found here and here.
I don't have time for mysterious strangers. Even the really hot ones.
I met him in a bar the night before I left to move across the country--and I never expected to see him again.But then he followed me...It would be creepy if he was just a stalker--but he’s not. He’s a protector, shielding me from a group of nutjobs who believe in dragons.He saved my life--but now it’s my turn.And apparently, the nutjobs aren’t wrong. Dragons are real.And I hold the key to saving them all.
author: Aiden Bates
